name: Shining Online - Demo 3B
summary: The final demo of Shining Online in its 'old style'. Features battles, NPC interaction and nifty graphics! This edition is discontinued.
description: The final demo of Shining Online in its 'old style'. Features battles, NPC interaction and nifty graphics! This edition is discontinued.

name: Shining Online - Demo 1
summary: The very first demo of Shining Online. Contains the very first level of the ST version of the game, but without any plot spoiling dialogue!
description: The very first demo of Shining Online. Contains the very first level of the ST version of the game, but without any plot spoiling dialogue! No battles, but they will be added at a later date.
